TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBindingsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection

summary.span: 代表控制項的資料繫結集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of data bindings for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簡單資料繫結藉由加入物件至。Simple data binding is accomplished by adding objects to a . 任何物件，繼承自類別可以存取透過屬性。Any object that inherits from the class can access the through the property. 針對一份 Windows 控制項支援資料繫結，請參閱類別。For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the class. 包含標準的收集方法，例如， ，和。The contains standard collection methods such as , , and . 若要取得控制項若要使用所屬屬性。To get the control that the belongs to, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將物件至五個控制項： 四個控制項和控制項。The following code example adds objects to a of five controls: four controls and a control. 可透過 類別的 屬性存取。The is accessed through the property of the class.
